messages.title: UNITING OUR COMMUNITY
messages.content: If you want to live in a society that works for everybody, if you want to save our hospitals, schools and public services from cuts and privatisation, if you want to stop the polluters from ruining our environment Vote Labour on 12 December.

messages.title: MAKE SURE YOUR VOTE COUNTS
messages.content: The only poll that matters is the one on election day. The people of Putney, Roehampton and Southfields deserve a new MP who will be on your side, fighting for you in Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's position on Brexit is clear: let the people have the final say. Labour is the party that can and will deliver a public vote.
With our plans to end the public sector pay cap.
Scrap Universal Credit, and lower the voting age to 16.
Lower the voting age to 16, Labour will create a more fair and equal society where we all move forward together, with nobody left behind.
Â£250bn upgrade to our energy, transport and digital infrastructure.
Save the Free TV Licence for senior citizens.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you want to stop Brexit, a vote for anything other than Labour is a wasted vote. Justine Greening, elected here as a Conservative at the last election is not standing again because she couldn't tolerate Boris Johnson's reckless Brexit. The Conservative candidate here is Boris Johnson's yes man. The only way Labour can win is if the Remain vote splits. Only a vote for Labour will stop the Conservatives winning here.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour's position on Brexit is clear: let the people have the final say.
issues.environment: If you want to stop the polluters from ruining our environment Vote Labour
issues.health: If you want to save our hospitals

quotes.text: If you want to live in a society that works for everybody, if you want to save our hospitals, schools and public services from cuts and privatisation, if you want to stop the polluters from ruining our environment Vote Labour on 12 December.
